content: {"Name": "Christ Our Light Catholic Church Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 57, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Christ Our Light", "More_Information": "Registered Patrons must call ahead each month on the Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday prior to our distribution date (3rd Saturday of month).  Emergency orders are processed as soon as possible, and clients are told when to pick the order up. Patrons wait in their cars, a member of our staff checks them in and their order is brought out to their car. Guest can visit once per month", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Albany", "Address": "1 Maria Drive", "City": "Loudonville", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12211", "Phone": "(518) 459-6635", "Hours_of_Operation": "3rd Sat of Month 8:15-11:30am", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.christourlightchurch.org/Outreach", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.7092807", "Longitude": "-73.7910862", "Last_Updated": "02-06-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
